SDG_GOAL: Goal 12: Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns
SDG_TARGET: Target: 12.3 By 2030, halve per capita global food waste at the retail and consumer levels and reduce food losses along production and supply chains, including post-harvest losses
SDG_INDICATOR:
Indicator: 12.3.1 (a) Food loss index and (b) food waste index

This metadata refers only to part (a) of the indicator 12.3.1: Food loss index.
SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: Goal 12: Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns
SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: Target: 12.3 By 2030, halve per capita global food waste at the retail and consumer levels and reduce food losses along production and supply chains, including post-harvest losses
SDG_INDICATOR__GLOBAL:
Indicator: 12.3.1 (a) Food loss index and (b) food waste index

This metadata refers only to part (a) of the indicator 12.3.1: Food loss index.
